title: Proposal to reduce Golff Farm mining revenue & adjust the mining pools list（关于Golff Farm挖矿收益减少及调整矿池名单的提案）
body:
The current Golff Farm mining output is 110,000 per week. In order to better protect the current token holders's interests, and also beneficial for Golff financial ecosystem's long-term development, we recommend to adjust the current mining speed when the sixth round of Farm mining begins. Adjust the mining speed to 60,000 output per week, which is a 45% reduction in output.
现有Golff Farm挖矿产出为每周11万枚，为更好地保障当前持币用户的利益并且有利于Golff金融生态的长期发展，建议在第六轮Farm挖矿开始后，调整现有Farm挖矿产出速度，调整为每周挖矿产出量为6万枚，减产了45%。

At the same time, to ensure the liquidity of GOF and encourage users to participate in Golff Vault products, starting from the sixth round of mining, we recommend to cancel the Golff Farm mining pool voting and adjust the mining pool to only support GOF and Uni-V2 (GOF-ETH) , G-V2Token (certificate generated by Vault2.0) mining. The mining pool quota allocation will be 15,000 incentive tokens per week in GOF mining pool,  the incentive for Uni-V2 (GOF-ETH) is 15,000 per week, and all the mining pools of G-V2Token are equally divided to 30,000 per week.
同时，为保证GOF的流动性以及激励用户参与Golff Vault产品，从第六轮挖矿开始，建议Golff Farm矿池取消投票提名，将矿池调整为只支持GOF、Uni-V2（GOF-ETH）、G-V2Token（Vault2.0产生的权利凭证）挖矿。矿池额度分配：GOF代币矿池的激励为每周1.5万个，Uni-V2(GOF-ETH)的激励为每周1.5万个，G-V2Token的所有矿池每周平分3万个。

On the one hand, the above proposal can reduce the negative impact of some mining and selling users on GOF. On the other hand, G-V2Token increases the mining revenue of users participating in Golff Vault 2.0, which can encourage users to actively participate in the new version of Golff Vault products.
以上的提案一方面可以减少部分挖卖提用户对GOF的负面影响，另一方面G-V2Token增加了参与Golff Vault 2.0用户的挖矿收益，可以激励用户积极参与新版Golff Vault产品。
choices: Agree to the proposal（同意提案）
Objection to the proposal（反对提案）
author: 0x22258DD3b63a0Ee8765165cA3D26522301C6740c
